#{isgetin}, #{dczState}, #{turncount}, #{actualClassdate}, #{cangdanRelation}, #{discountsState}, #{ywFeedback}, #{detailedAddress}, #{putoffClass}, #{costVerify}, #{billState}, #{dcGaidanState}, #{receiveemailUserSend}, #{sendemailTime}, #{sendemailNumber}, #{receiveShCostId}, #{receiveOrderEmail}, #{orderClassBh}, #{xgCostcurrency}, #{qgCostcurrency}, #{shCostcurrency}, #{sitecostCurrency}, #{changeClassnumber}, #{changeClassdate}, #{changeBoxnumber}, #{ischange}, #{exameTime}, #{gdBoat}, #{gdBoaturl}, #{gdCjsremark}, #{gdVoucherurl}, #{gdVoucher}, #{totalturncount}, #{totalturncountavg}, #{receiveOrderZihemail},
mapper.delete:
delete from busi_shippingorder where order_ID in
#{orderId}
mapper.select: select sum(if(container_type like '%20%',container_boxAmount/2,container_boxAmount)) from busi_shippingorder where class_ID = #{classId} and IsConsolidation = "0" and IsExamline != "2" and IsExamline != "3" and IsExamline != "8"
select class_EastAndWest from busi_classes where class_ID = #{classId}

select case when '0'= class_EastAndWest then order_unloadSite else order_uploadSite end from busi_shippingorder where class_ID = #{classId} and IsExamline != "2" and IsExamline != "3" and IsExamline != "8"
group by order_unloadSite
group by order_uploadSite

select bs.order_number as orderNum, bs.container_boxAmount as boxNum, bs.container_type as boxType, bsg.goods_KGS as kg, bsg.goods_CBM as val from busi_shippingorder bs left join busi_shippingorder_goods bsg on bs.order_ID = bsg.order_ID where bs.class_ID = #{classId} and IsConsolidation = "0" and bs.container_type like concat('%', '20', '%')
